cyclone.name: MARCO
cyclone.current_location: about 185 miles NW of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northwest across the central Gulf, expected to reach southeast Louisiana Monday then drift westward along the Louisiana coast toward east Texas while weakening
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeast Louisiana (near Morgan City–Mouth of the Pearl River)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch Sabine Pass TX to Morgan City LA; Ocean Springs MS to AL/FL border; Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas, Mobile Bay
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to Mouth of Pearl River; Storm Surge Warning Morgan City LA to Ocean Springs MS
weather_observation.impacted_coast: central and north-central Gulf Coast from Louisiana through Mississippi and Alabama; minimal impact upper Texas coast
weather_observation.wind: Gusty winds possible, but chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds is low (<10%).
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected on the upper Texas coast (likely <2 ft).
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could deliver 1–3 inches of rain Tuesday into early Wednesday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated seas and rip-current risk in the near-port approaches; minor schedule disruptions possible.
